I found no lossless version here or on KAT, but I found this version as a CD image on a file locker, so I decided I'd split it up according to the accompanying CUE-file and put it up here for better exposure. Very nice soundtrack, especially "Summer", "The Rain" and "River Side". The movie is also quite relaxing.
